title: MAHJONG CLASSIC
description: Enjoy the ancient board game classic Mahjong! In this version, beautiful graphics and hundreds of levels are waiting for you. Play in relaxed mode without time or race against the clock and try to earn 3 stars - it's up to you! The object of the game is to match pairs of tiles and eliminate all pieces from the board. Use a hint or shuffle when you are stuck and try to complete all levels. Are you up for the challenge?
